title: The Best Actress’ Rebirth: A Doted Cute Wife of Mr. Lu - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Celebrities   Disabilities   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Revenge   Second Chance   Showbiz   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters
author: 尘歌
description: In her last life, she was a noted actress with a bright future, but she ended up being framed by her younger biological sister, resulting in her notoriety and loss of her home. After the rebirth, she swears to get back what she was snatched in her last life one by one. All that matters for Qin Yao is to take the revenge, while someone gets in the middle. Mr. Lu, incredibly affluent and is in great control of Hailan City, throws 30 million towards her, saying, 'Yao, I'd like to be in a relationship... with you.' '...'>
